text: Personal Mountains is a live album by American pianist Keith Jarrett which was released on the ECM label in 1989. It was recorded by Jarrett's 'European Quartet' (featuring Jan Garbarek, Palle Danielsson and Jon Christensen), in different live performances in Tokyo in April 1979. ==Reception== The Allmusic review by Richard S. Ginell awarded the album 4 stars, stating, "Clearly this is one of the peaks of the European quartet's discography.".Ginell, R. title: Personal Mountains
